trans-unit.target: 可用的本地化语言:ru、en(工作仍在进行)

trans-unit.source: Console game manager written in python. See full description at BoardGameGeek.
trans-unit.target: 用python编写的控制台游戏管理器。请参阅BoardGameGeek的完整说明。

trans-unit.source: Game "1572: The Lost Expedition" (designed by Mike Heim).
trans-unit.target: 游戏“ 1572：失落的远征”（由Mike Heim设计）。

trans-unit.source: This is a one page (print-and-play, PnP), ultra-portable, black and white solitaire game. You assume the role of a small party of conquistadors trying to reach the Atlantic Ocean after a failed expedition deep in the New World. This game is limited to 42 turns and each turn consists of phases such as Map Making, Exploring, and Hunting where a handful of dice are allocated in a press-your-luck fashion. For those that enjoy role-playing, there is also an optional Journaling phase where you try to tell a story about what happened on your turn. Can you reach the Atlantic Ocean before time runs out or before you lose all of your Conquistadors?
trans-unit.target: 这是一个单页(打印和播放,PnP),超便携,黑白纸牌游戏。你扮演一小队征服者的角色,在新大陆深处探险失败后,试图到达大西洋。这款游戏限时42回合,每回合由地图制作、探索和狩猎等阶段组成,在这些阶段中,一把把骰子以按运气的方式分配。对于那些喜欢角色扮演的玩家来说,还有一个可选的Journaling阶段,在这个阶段,你可以尝试讲述一个关于你的回合发生的故事。你能在时间耗尽之前或在失去所有征服者之前到达大西洋吗?
